import React, { Component} from 'react' import { Spinner,Table } from 'reactstrap'; export default class Stats extends Component { centeredStyle = { display:"flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent:"center" } render() { const gamestate = this.props.gamestate; const isPlayer_one = this.props.isPlayer_one; const opponent_name = (isPlayer_one)? gamestate.p2_name : gamestate.p1_name; const wins = (isPlayer_one)?gamestate.p1_score:gamestate.p2 return (
{gamestate.p1_turn === isPlayer_one &&
Your Turn
} {gamestate.p1_turn !== isPlayer_one &&
{opponent_name}'s Turn
}

Wins

Ties

) } }
